mapper.insert: insert into bbs (BBSNO, BBSWRITE,BBSTITLE,BBSCONTENT, uploadpath, fileloca,filename,filerealname,BBSOC) VALUES (BBS_SEQ.nextval,#{bbsWrite},#{bbsTetle},#{bbsContent}, #{uploadPath},#{fileLoca} ,#{fileName},#{fileRealName},#{bbsoc})
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from bbs where bbsTitle like '%'||#{searchName}||'%' where bbsWriter like'%'||#{searchName}||'%' where bbsContent like '%'||#{searchName}||'%' where bbsTitle like '%'||#{searchName}||'%'or bbsContent like '%'|| #{searchName}||'%' where 1 = 1
